author: Special Correspondent
V S
text:
CULTURE

Isha: Yaksha – A celestial event of music, dance and spirit, Yoga Centre, Vellingiri Foothills, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Park Institution: Launch of Free Tennis Coaching Academy for Women, Sania Mirza takes part, 10 a.m.

Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology: Sania Mirza inaugurates synthetic tennis courts,

10 a.m.

Avinashilingam University: National Science Day Celebration, Thiruchitrambalam auditorium, 10.30 a.m.; Recent Trends in Spectroscopy Research in association SACSE of IGCAR, Administrative Block, 9.45 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Workshop on “Manufacturing excellence through 3D printing technology”, 9.30 a.m.; CSI Regional level student convention, 9.30 a.m.

PSG College of Arts and Science: One-day National Seminar on Fashion and Apparel, 9.30 a.m.

New Century Book House: Release of books by D. Pandian, PSG Tech Assembly hall, 5 p.m.

World Vision India: Awareness programme on Drug Addiction, Government Arts College, 3 p.m.

Kalaingar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology: National Workshop, 9.30 a.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Design contest, JN Hall, 9.30 a.m.

Coimbatore City Police and Friends of Police: Training programme on community policing, police quarters community hall, Uppilipalayam, 10 a.m.

Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan College of Engineering: Guest lecture on Management Guru, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Guru Institute of Technology: Guest lecture on Thermal Power Generation, Seminar Hall, 10 a.m.

VLB Janaki Ammal College of Arts and Science: Seminar, 10 a.m.

Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry: Stakeholders consultation on IESS 2047,V-2.0, Corporation Commissioner K. Vijayakarthikeyan takes part, chamber towers, Avanashi Road, 5 p.m.

SNS College of Technology: Project Contest and Talent Show,

9.30 a.m.

Vivekananda Institute of Management Studies: Quiz Club and ED Cell Contest 2016, 9.45 a.m.

PSG College of Arts and Science: National Seminar on Fashion and Apparel NSFA 2016, Library Hall, 9 a.m.

Sankara College of Science and Commerce: Guest lecture, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Mega Marketing Mela “Sandhai – 2016”,

9.30 a.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Thanks Giving Day, 10.30 a.m.

Pioneer College of Arts and Science: Gliterz National Conclave on Indian Financial Markets, 10 a.m.

CODISSIA – SIDBI Industrial Services: Counselling and Guidance to entrepreneurs, CODISSIA Conference Hall, Huzur Road, 3 p.m.

POLLACHI

Sree Saraswathi Thiyagaraja College: HR Meet, 10 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
